item.description:
After some prodding i have decided to start a regular 3.5edition campaign on every other saturday at 4PM (time subject to change upon suggestions). I will be doing my best to fill the void left by Franks campaign. This group will be in the same setting as my regular tuesday group and the 2 groups will be working towards similar goals separately (an idea i picked up from Frank).

Characters will be rolled up today on the spot, no major restrictions, however, im frown upon most ideas that involve level adjustments. So if you plan on having more than a +1 adjustment forget about it :)
item.name: New Saturday Campaign at Kassels Keep
